title: Zilean and Vi Ults; Intentional or Glitch?
body:
So the following situation occurred to me in an ARAM;

> Get dived by a Vi.
> She starts to ult me.
> Kill her.
> She has a Zilean ult.
>Her ult doesn't stop and she kills me, even though she's in revive form. 

Now I know "Nothing stops Vi ult", but surely death should be an exception. Is this working as intended, and if so why is this what is intended?

replies.body:
Well I just tested Vi with a GA in a bot game ind she stopped dead mid dash.

Harder to try to get the knock up death to work unless i try under a tower.

And should Zilean ult work exactly like a GA?

I people can be healed an such while in the zilean revive, not sure if it's the same to GA.
I think this works similarly for Yasuo's ult if he dies mid air. Not 100% certain though but I've seen it happen before.

The difference is that yasuo's ult still continues even if he dies without reviving, but vi's is strange in that if she is still dashing it should stop, but upon reaching the target it behaves just like yasuo's ult, but if she was dashing while dead it is likely a bug.

I can't imagine Malphite continuing forward if killed even with Zil ult or GA.

That being said there are a few champions that keep going through GA like effects such as Fid and Kennen ults but they are aoe.

Vi's ult is not a channel but I'm thinking this was a glitch.
test it with GA if that works then yes intentinoal
Will try, but seems very difficult to set up :/.
Wouldn't be that hard, 3 people (Vi on one team, 1 person to be ult'd, 1 person to kill Vi.) > Custom > do it
